lead_paragraph: Adam Rippon and his fellow Americans Brandon Mroz and Armin Mahbanoozadeh finished 1-2-3 at the junior Grand Prix final in Gdansk, Poland, the first time one country has swept the men’s event in that tournament. Mirai Nagasu and Rachael Flatt captured the gold and silver in the women’s event, capping an impressive day for the Americans.
